name: Ourobotos
description:
solve the puzzle to end the enemy loop

controls:

- arrows to move

- x to shoot

- c to jump 

-up to use

- v to enter puzzle code and b to quit(use arrows to change the puzzle image) when finished go to the button and press up, if you solve the puzzle the door will open.

- r to restart

- down to roll

use roll to evade traps

form wrong puzzle and enemy will attack you.
